'''Resolution of Sojourner''' is an [[Artifact Set]] available at [[:Category:3-Star Artifacts|3-star]] and [[:Category:4-Star Artifacts|4-star]] rarities.

==How to Obtain==
* [[Adventurer Handbook#Experience|Adventurer Handbook Experience]] Chapter 3:
** "Visit the Statue of The Seven at Dawn Winery" for a 3{{star}} [[Crown of Parting]]
** "Open 45 chests" for a 3{{star}} [[Feather of Homecoming]]
** "Enhance an artifact to Lv. 4" for a 3{{star}} [[Goblet of the Sojourner]]
** 3{{star}} [[Heart of Comradeship]] for completing all tasks in chapter 3
* [[Adventure Rank/Adventurers' Guild Rewards|Rewards]] for reaching the following [[Adventure Rank]]s: 17, 19, 21, 22, 23
* [[Domain]]s:
** [[Midsummer Courtyard]]
** [[Momiji-Dyed Court]]
** [[City of Gold]]
** [[Denouement of Sin]]
** [[Sanctum of Rainbow Spirits]]

==Lore==
{{Artifact Lore}}

==Trivia==
* The lore for this Artifact set ties into the [[Wanderer's Troupe]], [[The Flute]] and [[The Widsith]].
*The lore seems to be referring to one of the members of the [[Wanderer's Troupe]]. More specifically, the wielder of [[The Stringless]].
